articles.title: Russian prosecutors seek 9 1/2-year sentence for basketball star Brittney Griner - CBC Sports
articles.description: An emotional Brittney Griner apologized for her actions as her drug possession trial drew to a close Thursday in Russia, and a prosecutor urged that the American basketball star be convicted and sentenced to 9-½ years in prison in a case that reached the high…

articles.title: LOOK: Fil-Am mixed martial artist hailed as hero after taking down NYC assault suspect | ANC - ANC 24/7
articles.description: Rundown: A Filipino-American mixed martial artist is hailed as a hero after he took down a man who assaulted six people in New York City.For more ANC news vi...
